label:label.xlink:title: If T 20.03, r0040, c0220 equal 'TRUE' then there should be at least one row filled in Z 07.02 (for each type of report and each country). The Value of transactions (T 20.03, r0040, c0030) in the CFR should be equal to the sum of the Monetary amount (Z 07.02; c0050) in the RESOL for all reported entities per function per country.

gen:link.label:label: If T 20.03, r0040, c0220 equal 'TRUE' then there should be at least one row filled in Z 07.02 (for each type of report and each country).
